long_description: You may be on the trail many miles from the closest town, but with the Sea to Summit Pocket Shower you can still enjoy a warm shower. High-performance polyurethane-coated nylon fabric is water- and leakproof; large roll-top opening allows easy filling. Black color absorbs heat from the sun to warm the water, or you can simply add hot water directly to the bag. Twist the shower head to control water pressure; 10-liter volume provides approximately seven minutes of showering.
